thread.section_title: The Westin Paris - Vendome - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Gorgeous hotel in the middle of everything
thread.title_full: Gorgeous hotel in the middle of everything - Review of The Westin Paris - Vendome, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Colleen N
title: Gorgeous hotel in the middle of everything
text:
We stayed at the Vendome for a few days in January. Upon arrival we were quickly checked in by very friendly staff, Our room was large and sunny. There was so much room - it was quite spacious for American standards, so for a European room is was enormous. It was just beautifully decorated as well, We could see the Tour Eiffel from our large windows and watched it sparkle nightly. We were within walking distance to everything we wanted to see. It is a perfect location and a beautiful hotel. 7 women traveling and we all felt safe and enjoyed our 3 big beautiful rooms.
Room Tip: Get a Eiffel Tower view... it is spectacular! Some street noise but nothing that kept us up late or... See more room tips
